Title: Creates a banking development district working group
Summary: Creates a banking development district working group to assess the banking development district program and provide an annual report to the governor and legislature on the strengths and weaknesses of such program; defines unbanked and underbanked.
LawCode: Add ยง96-dd, amd ยง96-d, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to creating a banking development district working group; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
